DOCNAME: CASE OF HASAN GENC v. TURKEY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was granted a lease by GPE to run a car park on a plot of land by the coast in the GPE district of GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG attached to ORG issued CARDINAL orders requesting the applicant to pay compensation for occupying the car park DATE and DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE , DATE and DATE respectively the applicant filed CARDINAL separate cases with ORG against ORG , requesting that the orders be annulled . The first case concerned the period DATE and DATE , the second case concerned the period DATE and DATE and the third case concerned the period DATE and DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG annulled the orders dated DATE and DATE . The administrative authority appealed . ORG on DATE ORG quashed the respective judgments of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG followed the reasoning set out in ORG decision and dismissed the cases . The applicant appealed .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the respective judgments of ORG once again .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG decided to annul the respective compensation orders .
CARDINAL . According to the information in the case file based on the latest submissions by the parties , both actions are apparently still pending before ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG annulled the compensation order dated DATE . The administrative authority appealed and subsequently on CARDINAL DATE ORG quashed the judgment of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG followed the reasoning set out in ORG decision and dismissed the case . According to the information in the case file , this action is still pending before ORG .
